summary:
Extensive Global Talent Acquisition experience covering both recruitment agency and in-house across a range of sectors including oil & gas, construction, infrastructure, engineering, technology and business support services. 

Successfully built recruiting teams and managed national and international recruiting functions ranging from executive management to graduate, volume, executive search, employer branding, diversity.

Excellent leadership skills with a philosophy of creating a high level of trust with stakeholders

Highly innovative, always seeking to achieve goals by improving efficiencies through upgrading of methods, processes or resources

High level of creativity, and outstanding written and verbal communication skills

Ability to work and adapt to a range of organisational structures, developing strong relationships with all levels of management

Willingness and ability to manage a team of recruiters both centrally or remotely

Strong presentation skills in a range of settings including small or large groups and upper/executive management

EXPERIENCE
Recruitment Agency Experience (Early Career)
InHouse Recruitment Management Experience 

SECTOR EXPERIENCE
Business Leadership 
Management Consultancy 
Information Technology & Telecoms
Oil & Gas - Petroleum Engineering, Unconventional Resources, Refinery
Construction - Cost Management, Surveying, Project/Programme Management
Engineering - Infrastructure, Rail, Civil

profile_positions.description:
Accountable for delivering end-to-end expert recruitment services within Oil, Gas, and Business Support and Technology business lines at Saudi Aramco

Developed, initiated and implemented a wide range of cost-effective sourcing strategies that resulted in meeting hiring targets each year

Designed, implemented and managed in-person over 50 successful international recruiting events worldwide hiring in excess of 900 specialists in 4 years

Established and maintained strong stakeholder and external sourcing relationships

Managed a dispersed team of recruiters in Europe, Asia, USA and oversaw the recruiting, interviewing, selection and pre-employment processing of candidates

Coordinated sourcing methods used by the recruiting team including outsource agencies and advertisers

Compiled, maintained, analysed and reported on recruitment activities, applicant flow, interviews, new hires, cost per hire, and related information
